content: **point reyes blanket** is an easy knit and purl design for experienced beginners this blanket pattern is reversible with a modern graphic texture select among seven blanket sizes and enjoy knitting up your new home decor today **skill level ** experienced beginner **pattern download ** 4-page digital pdf 8 5 x 11 save and print not a physical knitted item **video tutorial ** studio knit s youtube channel 1 7 blanket sizes available 20 x 22 baby stroller blanket yarn amount 250 yds / 229 m 2 skeins of cascade 128 28 x 28 baby blanket yarn amount 420 yds / 384 m 4 skeins of cascade 128 36 x 40 receiving blanket yarn amount 770 yds / 704 m 6 skeins of cascade 128 36 x 46 lapghan blanket yarn amount 880 yds / 805 m 7 skeins of cascade 128 44 x 58 blanket throw yarn amount 1 370 yds / 1 253 m 11 skeins of cascade 128 68 x 88 twin bedspread yarn amount 3 200 yds / 2 926 m 25 skeins of cascade 128 92 x 94 queen bedspread yarn amount 4 600 yds / 4 200 m 36 skeins of cascade 128 gauge swatch seed stitch 4″ x 4″ = 12 stitches x 19 row row 1 * k1 p1 * row 2 * p1 k1 * knitting supplies yarn bulky weight yarn #5 1 circular knitting needle #10 us / 6 0 mm 36 length or longer tapestry needle scissors knitting techniques co = cast on long tail method k = knit stitch p = purl stitch bind off weave in yarn tails 1 https //youtu be/6k0jeqtc5pa
